# Quantum Scoring SDK

Universal framework for business scoring and optimization.

## Installation
pip install quantum-scoring-sdk

## Basic Usage
from quantum_sdk import Optimizer
opt = Optimizer(api_key='your-license-key')
score = opt.evaluate(data, config)
